solution_line_template: Each chicken lays {days_per_week} * {eggs_per_chicken_per_day} = <<{days_per_week}*{eggs_per_chicken_per_day}={eggs_per_chicken_per_week}>>{eggs_per_chicken_per_week} eggs a week
Each week all the chickens lay {eggs_per_chicken_per_week} * {num_chickens} = <<{eggs_per_chicken_per_week}*{num_chickens}={total_eggs_per_week}>>{total_eggs_per_week} eggs
In {num_weeks} weeks all the chickens lay {total_eggs_per_week} * {num_weeks} = <<{total_eggs_per_week}*{num_weeks}={total_eggs_in_4_weeks}>>{total_eggs_in_4_weeks} eggs
